title: Beautiful 5 br House
posting_body: Gorgeous - 5 Bedroom - 3 bathroomAddress: Rico Peak Ct, Las Vegas, NV 89128

Beautiful 2-Story Property - South Shores Las Vegas BEAUTIFUL TWO-STORY HOME IN THE HEART OF SOUTH SHORES, BIG CORNER LOT, FEATURES 5 BEDROOMS, WITH A BEDROOM DOWNSTAIRS WITH FULL BATH, 3 FULL BATHS, BRAND NEW EXTERIOR AND INTERIOR PAINT, INGROUND POOL AND SPA, COVERED PATIO, 3 CAR GARAGE, LOTS OF LIVING SPACE!
FORMAL LIVING ROOM AND DINING ROOM, SEPARATE FAMILY ROOM, WIDE HALLWAYS.
EAT IN AREA IN THE KITCHEN WITH A LOT OF CABINETS AND COUNTER SPACE.
THIS HOME IS A MUST-HAVE IN A TERRIFIC LOCATION, CLOSE TO RAMPART AND LAKE MEAD, CLOSE TO SHOPPING, DINING, SCHOOLS, AND PARKS, YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED.
NEAR BOCA PARK AND DOWNTOWN SUMMERLIN, QUICK ACCESS TO N95, SUMMERLIN PARKWAY, AND THE 215.
EASY TO SHOW, JUST CALL TO MAKE AN APPOINTMENT.
WEEKLY POOL SERVICE AND LANDSCAPING INCLUDED IN RENT, TENANT RESPONSIBLE FOR BASIC UTILITY BILLS, GAS, WATER, AND ELECTRICITY.
OWNER-MANAGED, QUICK, AND EASY APPLICATION PROCESS.
CALL NOW to Schedule a Viewing -
Fast Response to Any/All phone calls/emails.
